title: someone in game made physical threats to me and didnt get banned
body:
The player in question called me an autistic %%%got repeatedly, after which he threatened to find and assault me. I reported him but he didnt get banned? CAn someone explain why pls

Edit: below u will additionally find a rioter harassing me, spamming comments about how i was toxic in a game. Im on zero tolerance and have yet to get perma banned for the game in which i was allegedly "harassing my teammates" by telling them that elise is a jgler with diving capabilities. Its actually quite a spectacle watching this rioter misconstrue all of my statements so im putting this little ps below the actual intent of my post.

replies.body:
1. In the game in question, nobody called you autistic. ( or anything close )
2. In the game in question, nobody called you a %%%got. ( or anything close )
3. In the game in question, they said 'if i was near them, I'd kick the shit out of them'. Not appropriate, but not exactly a credible threat.
4. You were harassing teammates. Blaming your deaths under the turret from their lack of follow-up.
5. You were pretty tilted, and reported every single player on your team after the game.
6. You continued to harass them in postgame chat.

TLDR; 
You're not remembering the game correctly. The player wasn't the toxic player you remember them to be, or are suggesting they were.

That is why I was asking if you are adding these games together in your mind. Maybe you are recalling all of the memorable, unacceptable events from a gaming session.

Even if a player doesn't get penalized, remember that if they continue with unacceptable behavior it will catch up with them. For example, if a player you report for unacceptable behavior goes into another game and harasses people, they game you reported will also be considered. This is why you see people with multiple games of chat logs.
